de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index.lsh.hashfamilies

Class AbstractProjectedHashFunctionFamily

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index.lsh.hashfamilies.AbstractProjectedHashFunctionFamily
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocalitySensitiveHashFunctionFamily<NumberVector>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EuclideanHashFunctionFamily, ManhattanHashFunctionFamily

    public abstract class AbstractProjectedHashFunctionFamily
extends Object
implements LocalitySensitiveHashFunctionFamily<NumberVector>
    Abstract base class for projection based hash functions.
    Since:
    0.6.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
